summary: The 'Cultivating Investment in Recycling and Circular Local Economies Act of 2025' (CIRCLE Act) proposes a tax credit for investments in recycling infrastructure. This includes a 30% credit for qualified recycling property, with potential bonus credits for domestic content. The credit phases out between 2026 and 2037. The bill defines eligible property, qualified recycling materials, and provides special rules for subsidized property and elective payments. It aims to boost the national recycling rate by supporting modernized recycling operations and increasing the supply of domestically recycled materials.
